text: Hoshina Masasada ' (June 14, 1588 – December 22, 1661) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Iino Domain. He was first a senior hatamoto with a 3000 koku income, before he was made lord of Iino. Category:1588 births Category:1661 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Hatamoto Category:Hoshina clan
title: Hoshina Masasada
